name: Mazin Saga - Mutant Fighter [SG]
description: Mazin Saga: Mutant Fighter (マジンサーガ, known as Mazin Wars in PAL region) is a video game for the Sega Mega Drive. It is a beat em'up/versus fighting game based on the MazinSaga manga by Go Nagai, which was in turn a reboot of Nagai's original Mazinger Z.
